metalica.title: Be Our VIP Guest at Lollapalooza 2022 & Support AWMH
metalica.text: Thanks to the amazing people at C3 presents along with our friends at Fandiem, we're bringing you the opportunity to enjoy Lollapalooza 2022 while supporting All Within My Hands and World Central Kitchen!

metalica.title: Support World Central Kitchen with All Within My Hands
metalica.text: Please join us in supporting World Central Kitchen’s work aiding in the humanitarian crisis in Eastern Europe, as over four million Ukrainian citizens have fled their country.

metalica.title: Join Kirk and Robert to Celebrate Record Store Day
metalica.text: The 15th annual Record Store Day is just around the corner, and to kick off the festivities early, the Grammy Museum in Los Angeles will be hosting a special panel discussion about the history and importance of the annual event on Tuesday, April 19.

metalica.title: Stream the 40th Anniversary Shows with our Return to the Coda Collection
metalica.text: The channel is relaunching today with the Cunning Stunts and Orgullo, Pasión, y Gloria: Tres Noches en la Ciudad de México, followed shortly by the two 40th Anniversary shows, freshly re-edited and fully remixed!

metalica.title: Return to Lollapalooza
metalica.text: We’re excited to announce that we’ll be headlining on Thursday, July 28th during this summer’s four-day extravaganza at Lollapalooza in Chicago.

metalica.title: Heading East!
metalica.text: We're adding Buffalo’s Highmark Stadium and Pittsburgh’s PNC Park to our summer tour dates.

metalica.title: Metal Blade Records Celebrates 40 Years with Re-Release of Metal Massacre
metalica.text: Metal Massacre, will be available for the first time since 1984 on limited-edition vinyl on April 22, 2022.

metalica.title: One More for Europe!
metalica.text: We’re excited to add one final show to our European summer vacation as we’ll be heading to Bilbao, Spain on July 3 for Bilbao Bizkaia Rock Day at Estadio San Mamés.

metalica.title: Be Our VIP Guest at BottleRock 2022 & Support AWMH
metalica.text: Thanks to our friends at Fandiem and BottleRock Napa Valley, you have the chance to be our VIP guest at the BottleRock festival this May 27-29, all while supporting All Within My Hands!

metalica.title: Metallica Night With The SF Giants Returns
metalica.text: We’re really excited for the return of Metallica Night at Oracle Park with our hometown baseball team, the San Francisco Giants, on May 24th.

metalica.title: Kirk Hammett Makes His Solo Debut With "Portals"
metalica.text: Did somebody say solo project? You read right! Our very own Kirk Hammett has recorded a four-song instrumental EP and will be celebrating Record Store Day with its worldwide release.

metalica.title: Jonny Z, R.I.P.
metalica.text: Heavy music lost one of its great champions today when Jonny Z left this world far too soon.

metalica.title: Head East... To Boston!
metalica.text: We’re psyched to add another festival stop to our growing list of 2022 tour dates as we’ll hit the stage at Boston Calling this Memorial Day Weekend!

metalica.title: We're Headed To BottleRock Napa Valley This Summer!
metalica.text: January 12 Update: We’re headlining the first night of this year’s BottleRock Napa Valley festival on May 27!

metalica.title: Relive The #Metallica40 Weekend Or Catch What You Missed!
metalica.text: Did you miss one or both nights? Were you there and want to experience the stream production? Or maybe you just want to watch the shows again and again. Whatever your reason, now’s your chance!

metalica.title: 40th Anniversary Shows Streaming Live!
metalica.text: We’re incredibly excited to announce that our friends at Amazon will be streaming both shows live, as they happen, worldwide and for free!

metalica.title: 40th Anniversary Pre-Show Bash
metalica.text: If you’re joining us at Chase Center on December 17 and/or 19, kick off the night right with our pre-show bash hosted by comedian Dean Delray along with Dj LORD as they set the mood to get everyone fired up before we hit the stage!

metalica.title: San Francisco 40th Anniversary Weekend Takeover – Free and Fun!
metalica.text: We're back with more weekend activities, and this time they're free, fun, and philanthropic!
